title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Oct 20 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Thursday, 20 October 2011


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site ::

On the Thursday edition of the Alex Jones Show, Alex returns to the command post in Austin and confronts the latest breaking news, including the reported death of ousted Libyan leader Gaddafi. 

Alex talks with investigative journalist and intelligence specialist Wayne Madsen about the NATO hit on Gaddafi as the "Lion of the Desert" attempted to flee Sirte after it fell to al-Qaeda in Libya, described as "rebels" by the corporate media. 

Webster Tarpley and Steve Pieczenik also talk with Alex about the hit. 

Alex welcomes to the show John B. Wells, an accomplished composer, musician, writer, actor, martial arts instructor, and aviator best know for his work as a voice artist.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
